imdb.plot outline: The program presents different fields in which issues of gender equality and inequality first became evident; i.e., those areas and aspects in which the importance of this theme can be appreciated. Moreover, it explores the creation of an egalitarian society, one that focuses on health, education, economy, and power as indicators of the degree of equality in a nation. These factors are used to assess the current situation in Mexico.
imdb.title: La mujer y la equidad
plot: The program presents different fields in which issues of gender equality and inequality first became evident; i.e., those areas and aspects in which the importance of this theme can be appreciated. Moreover, it explores the creation of an egalitarian society, one that focuses on health, education, economy, and power as indicators of the degree of equality in a nation. These factors are used to assess the current situation in Mexico.::Clío TV
